name: nginx_json_graylog4
summary: Graylog 4.0+ compatible version of nginx_json content pack
description:
* Originally created by petestorey26
* Updated by paulbarfuss for graylog3.0+
* Updated for graylog4.0+ by the jpop
* Added GeoIP by the jpop

description.@value: Overview of requests handled by NGINX
Requests last 24h

summary.@value: This is a list of all sources that sent in messages to Graylog.

description.@value: This is a list of all sources that sent in messages to Graylog. You can narrow the timerange by zooming in on the message histogram, or you can increase the time range by specifying a broader one in the controls at the top. You can also specify filters to limit the results you are seeing. You can also add additional widgets to this dashboard, or adapt the appearance of existing widgets to suit your needs.
Overview of requests handled by NGINX
GeoIP Lookup Tables
GeoIP Cache
GeoIP Lookup
GeoIP Pipeline

source.@value:
pipeline "GeoIP Pipeline"
stage 0 match all
rule "remote_addr geoip lookup"
end

description.@value: GeoIP Source Rule
all message to nginx_access and nginx_error
All requests that were answered with a HTTP code in the 400 range by nginx
All requests that were answered with a HTTP code in the 500 range by nginx
All requests that were answered with a HTTP 404 by nginx
All requests that were logged into the nginx error_log
All requests that were logged into the nginx access_log
all message to nginx_access and nginx_error
All requests that were logged into the nginx access_log
All requests that were answered with a HTTP code in the 500 range by nginx
All requests that were logged into the nginx error_log
All requests that were answered with a HTTP 404 by nginx
All requests that were answered with a HTTP code in the 400 range by nginx
